title: Availability
text:
I am actively seeking new academic and research opportunities. I am currently available for:

Research Collaboration: Open to collaborating on projects involving statistical analysis and data science.
Postdoctoral Positions: Interested in proposals and fellowships in the fields of Statistics, Spatial Statistics, or Biostatistics.

title: Consulting
text:
I am available for consulting regarding statistical analysis, data science projects, and academic collaborations.
If you are interested in discussing a potential opportunity, please contact me via email at amnhancololo@gmail.com or amnhancololo@ime.usp.br.
